trans-unit.source: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a list that is displayed when the user clicks a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項，此控制項可在使用者按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> 時，從顯示的清單中選取單一項目。

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> replace and add functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 會在之前版本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> 控制項中取代及新增功能，您還是可以選擇保留 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Menu" /> 以提供回溯相容性以及供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> to display drop-down lists of options, such as a color picker.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>来顯示的選項，例如色彩選擇器下拉式清單。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> classes to make a three-button color picker that changes the foreground color of the form.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>類別，讓變更表單的前景色彩的三個按鈕的色彩選擇器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> to show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control should automatically close when it has lost activation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項不再啟動時，是否應該自動關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> control automatically closes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> 控制項會自動關閉，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that always stays open, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>，一律會保持開啟狀態，請將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A>至`false`。

trans-unit.source: Consider handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> event instead of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請考慮處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>事件，而不是設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.AutoClose%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> field in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing> handler to specify custom closing logic.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>欄位中您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closing>指定自訂關閉邏輯的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box character.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字元已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box keys, such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法是在處理對話方塊按鍵，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 逸出及方向鍵前置處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.ProcessDialogKey%2A> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.ProcessDialogKey%2A>只傳送至父代的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的字元。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法通常會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A> method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>方法只會傳回`false`來表示控制項具有沒有助憶鍵。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範會覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic%2A>至展現自訂行為的方法。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the size of the owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to accommodate the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> if the owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is currently displayed, or clears and resets active <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> child controls of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> is not currently displayed.
